pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Pulumi AWS TagsPulumi package that helps manage tags for AWS resources.## Installation### PythonUse `pip` to install the package:```bashpip install pulumi_aws_tags```## UsageSee [examples](https://github.com/tlinhart/pulumi-aws-tags/blob/main/examples)directory for usage examples.## Reference- https://www.pulumi.com/blog/automatically-enforcing-aws-resource-tagging-policies/- https://github.com/joeduffy/aws-tags-example
